CHAT.comment: CAROL ANNE BOND, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:19 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MICHAEL R. DREEBEN, FOR RESPONDENT, IN SUPPORT OF PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF STEPHEN R. McALLISTER, AS AMICUS CURIAE, IN SUPPORT OF JUDGEMENT BELOW
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF PAUL D. CLEMENT ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER
